patthana15.73:1.1: Araṇaṃ upādinnupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupādinnupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.73:2.1: Araṇaṃ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
